entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon.
